channel.title: 508 server bug need help
channel.description: im new to 508 coding and im used to 317 the bug is when i get on and try to equip d claws it says you need 60 attack but my attack is higher then 60 then i get to 75 for godswrods and i equip that after im 80 i take it off and cant put it back on it says i need 75 for godswords so in other words i can equip items after my level is above the required level so i jsut wanna take out level limits how can i remove them from the 508 server?
